document_data.name: House of Tayif
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Tayif''', also called the '''Ghost-Warriors''', was a smaller tribe of [[Zakharan pantheon|unenlightened]] [[Al-Badia]] found in the [[High Desert]] of [[west Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p40">
document_data.Base of Operations: The House of Tayif ranged from just outside of [[Qudra]] in the north all the way to the [[Realm of Bleeding Trees]] in the south. True to the name of "Ghost-Warriors," their movements did not seem humanly possible given the speed at which they struck.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p40"/>
document_data.Organization: A thousand unenlightened [[Zakharan (ethnicity)|Zakharans]] formed the tribe. In truth, the tribe's numbers seemed to be much higher since they roamed the entire expanse of the High Desert.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p40"/>
document_data.Activities: This tribe survived purely by raiding. All of the raiders were masked and wore white during battle to hide their appearance.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p40"/>
document_data.Members: Sheikh [[Mouli al-Ajami]] ruled the House of Tayif in 1367 DR.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p40"/>
document_data.Relationships: The other tribes of the High Desert did not deal with the House of Tayif unless it was to clash arms.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p40"/>
